Đăng nhập bằng:

Management Trainee

Công Ty TNHH Loscam Việt Nam
Ngày cập nhật: 19/03/2019

Thông Tin Tuyển Dụng

  • Nơi làm việc: Hồ Chí Minh

    Lương: -

  • Ngành nghề: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ, Bán hàng / Kinh doanh, Dịch vụ khách hàng

    Hết hạn nộp: 20/04/2019

  • Cấp bậc:

Phúc lợi

  • Máy tính xách tay
  • Bảo hiểm theo quy định
  • Du Lịch
  • Phụ cấp
  • Thưởng
  • Chăm sóc sức khỏe
  • Đào tạo
  • Tăng lương
  • Phụ cấp thâm niên
  • Chế độ nghỉ phép

Mô tả Công việc

China Merchants Loscam is a leading supplier of packaging solutions and products. Our organization has operations in Thailand, Malaysia, Philippines, Vietnam, Singapore, Australia, New Zealand and Greater China.

Position: MANAGEMENT TRAINEE

Reporting to: General Manager / Human resources & Admin Manager – SE Asia

Package: Base Salary xx / month + 13th month + PF + Medical + Life Insurance benefits

Loscam Management Trainee is a training program designed to develop young talent with passion and commitment to reach their full potential and become an effective manager and future leader of the business. The program forms part of the business succession planning process.
The Trainee will undergo a 24 - 36 month structured training program involving gaining hands on experience in key functional areas (Sales, Customer Services, Operations, Human Resources and Finance) and participating as a team member in various project related assignments, providing opportunities to gain exposure and hone skills in various functional areas, across the SE Asia business. Initial geographic location in SE Asia will be dependent on the individual circumstances, but over the term of the program will involve placements across various markets in the Region.
Beyond the structured program the position will transition to cover a variety of supervisory or managerial roles of increasing responsibility and challenges each contributing to the development of a high potential Manager.

Yêu Cầu Công Việc

  • Aged 25 to 28 years
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Sales/ Key Account/ Customer Services
  • Master’s Degree (particularly MBA) a plus
  • Leadership potential with excellent interpersonal and team work skills
  • Highly analytical/management planning skill
  • High Computer literacy (MS Office, PowerPoint, Internet)
  • Cultural Sensitivity and ability to travel/ work on assignments across Region
  • Excellent command of spoken and written English
  • Team minded, inquisitive, eager to learn and ambitious
  • Hands on with a CAN DO attitude

Thông tin khác

  • Bằng cấp: Đại học
  • Độ tuổi: 25 - 28
  • Hình thức: Nhân viên chính thức

Giới thiệu về công ty

Công Ty TNHH Loscam Việt Nam

Qui mô công ty: 25-99
Loscam is one of the largest pallet and packaging equipment pooling organizations in Asia Pacific, providing Returnable Package Handling ( RPH) solutions...Chi tiết

Loscam is one of the largest pallet and packaging equipment pooling organizations in Asia Pacific, providing Returnable Package Handling ( RPH) solutions for use in supply chains. Loscam operates in 11 countries throughout South East Asia, Australia & New Zealand, and Greater China.
The business was established in the 1940s in Australia and the mid 1990s in Asia. Loscam introduced and has continuously developed pallet and other equipment pooling process over the past 20 years in South East Asia, being the leading pooling solutions service provider in the region.

http://www.loscam.com/
